name: Road Crisis HD
description:
Manage Extreme Traffic, tap to change the lights and control the flow, keep the intersection crash free, avoid jams, unlock new cars with amazing features (Taxi, Bus, Police, Ambulance, Firefighter). Get more points with rare vehicles. Easy to learn but you won’t be able to put it down.

- 3D Graphics
- Intuitive Controls
- Unlimited Gameplay
- Tons of fun
- Unlockable assets
